 1 = falling edge
 2 = rising edge
 3 = both

x-device-parameters.name: digital_input_2_config

 1 = alarm is enabled
0 = alarm is disabled

PORT1_H1_BITMASK = 1 
PORT1_H2_BITMASK = 2 
PORT1_L1_BITMASK = 4 
PORT1_L2_BITMASK = 8 
PORT1_DELTA_BITMASK = 16 

PORT2_H1_BITMASK = 32 
PORT2_H2_BITMASK = 64 
PORT2_L1_BITMASK = 128 
PORT2_L2_BITMASK = 256 
PORT2_DELTA_BITMASK = 512 

PORT3_H1_BITMASK = 1024 
PORT3_H2_BITMASK = 2048 
PORT3_L1_BITMASK = 4096 
PORT3_L2_BITMASK = 8192 
PORT3_DELTA_BITMASK = 16384 

PORT4_H1_BITMASK = 32768 
PORT4_H2_BITMASK = 65536 
PORT4_L1_BITMASK = 131072 
 PORT4_L2_BITMASK = 262144 
PORT4_DELTA_BITMASK = 524288

x-device-parameters.name: boot_phy
x-device-parameters.summary: The PHY to enable for 30s at bootup
x-device-parameters.description:
Enumeration:
 0 = Default
 1 = 1M
 2 = Coded

x-device-parameters.name: mobile_app_disconnect
x-device-parameters.summary: This is used when the mobile app wants to disconnect, causing the BT6 to confirm the disconnect before forcing it
x-device-parameters.description: 0 = do not disconnect, 1 = start disconnect after 2 seconds

x-device-parameters.name: attr_save_error_code
x-device-parameters.summary: Result code from deferred settings saving
x-device-parameters.description: negative error code, 0 on success

x-device-parameters.name: recover_settings_count
x-device-parameters.summary: Used for recovering settings
x-device-parameters.description: A rolling count of number of times the module has been recovered

x-device-parameters.name: block_downgrades
x-device-parameters.summary: Allows FOTA downgrading of older firmwares to be disallowed
x-device-parameters.description: Will disallow receiving older firmware files via FOTA when set to 1

x-device-parameters.name: security_request
x-device-parameters.summary: Request sensor sends a Bluetooth security request to upgrade connection security
x-device-parameters.description: Write 1 to have sensor send a security request for pairing

x-device-parameters.name: security_level
x-device-parameters.summary: Current Bluetooth security level as seen by the sensor
x-device-parameters.description: -1 indicates error, otherwise value indicates level as per bt_security_t

x-device-parameters.name: name
x-device-parameters.summary: Name of the device.  Generated by firmware: combines board type + portion of IMEI or BLE address

x-device-parameters.name: board
x-device-parameters.summary: Board Identifier

x-device-parameters.name: build_id
x-device-parameters.summary: Hash of firmware image

x-device-parameters.name: app_type
x-device-parameters.summary: Type of software application that is running

x-device-parameters.name: mount
x-device-parameters.summary: Mount point for file system accessible by SMP

x-device-parameters.name: commissioned
x-device-parameters.summary: Write (Control Point): true - Causes certs to be loaded, false - Causes cloud connection to be closed and certs to be unloaded. Read: true when commissioned with AWS
x-device-parameters.description: It is recommended to read certStatus after writing this.  Wait until it isn't busy.  If it is negative, read cloudError; otherwise wait for commissionedBusy to be false before writing this value again.

x-device-parameters.name: cert_status
x-device-parameters.summary: Status of certificate loader: negative errno

x-device-parameters.name: root_ca_name
x-device-parameters.summary: Root Certificate absolute file name

x-device-parameters.name: client_cert_name
x-device-parameters.summary: Client (Device) Certificate absolute file name

x-device-parameters.name: client_key_name
x-device-parameters.summary: Client (Device) Key absolute file name

x-device-parameters.name: endpoint
x-device-parameters.summary: (Amazon Web Services) Hostname

x-device-parameters.name: port
x-device-parameters.summary: (Amazon Web Server) Port

x-device-parameters.name: client_id
x-device-parameters.summary: (AWS) Client Id

x-device-parameters.name: topic_prefix
x-device-parameters.summary: Topic Prefix (for Contact Tracing publishing)

x-device-parameters.name: gateway_state
x-device-parameters.summary: Gateway State

x-device-parameters.name: peer_verify
x-device-parameters.summary: TLS configuration for secure MQTT transport - Indicates the preference for peer verification
x-device-parameters.note: Value takes effect on next connection attempt

x-device-parameters.name: battery_capacity
x-device-parameters.summary: Battery Capacity

x-device-parameters.name: battery_temperature
x-device-parameters.summary: Temperature of board (from LIS3DH) used in battery calculations

x-device-parameters.name: battery_charging_state
x-device-parameters.summary: Enumeration of charging state: Bit 0 = External Power State, Bit 1 = The battery is charging, Bit 2 = The battery is not charging, Bit 3 The battery is discharging.

x-device-parameters.name: battery_low_threshold
x-device-parameters.summary: Battery Low Threshold in millivolts

x-device-parameters.name: battery_alarm_threshold
x-device-parameters.summary: Battery Alarm Threshold in millivolts

x-device-parameters.name: battery_4
x-device-parameters.summary: The highest threshold in millivolts for a 4-segment charging meter

x-device-parameters.name: battery_3
x-device-parameters.summary: A threshold in millivolts for a 4-segment charging meter

x-device-parameters.name: battery_2
x-device-parameters.summary: A threshold in millivolts for a 4-segment charging meter

x-device-parameters.name: battery_1
x-device-parameters.summary: A threshold in millivolts for a 4-segment charging meter

x-device-parameters.name: battery_0
x-device-parameters.summary: The lowest threshold in millivolts for a 4-segment charging meter

x-device-parameters.name: battery_alarm
x-device-parameters.summary: Value indicating the low battery alarm state.

x-device-parameters.name: motion_odr
x-device-parameters.summary: Accelerometer Output Data Rate

x-device-parameters.name: motion_thresh
x-device-parameters.summary: Accelerometer Threshold

x-device-parameters.name: motion_scale
x-device-parameters.summary: Accelerometer Scale

x-device-parameters.name: motion_duration
x-device-parameters.summary: Accelerometer Motion Duration

x-device-parameters.name: motion_alarm
x-device-parameters.summary: 1 - Motion, 0 - No Motion

x-device-parameters.name: ct_aes_key
x-device-parameters.summary: AES key used for Contact Tracing

x-device-parameters.name: power_supply_voltage
x-device-parameters.summary: Measured power supply in volts.  Not valid for MG100

x-device-parameters.name: gateway_id
x-device-parameters.summary: ASCII string representing the IMEI (if modem present), otherwise Bluetooth MAC address

x-device-parameters.name: lte_network_state
x-device-parameters.summary: LTE network state enumeration

x-device-parameters.name: lte_startup_state
x-device-parameters.summary: Modem startup state

x-device-parameters.name: lte_rsrp
x-device-parameters.summary: Reference Signals Receive Power (RSRP) in dBm

x-device-parameters.name: lte_sinr
x-device-parameters.summary: Signal to Interference plus Noise Ratio (SINR) in dBm

x-device-parameters.name: lte_sleep_state
x-device-parameters.summary: Sleep state of driver

x-device-parameters.name: lte_rat
x-device-parameters.summary: Radio Access Technology

x-device-parameters.name: lte_version
x-device-parameters.summary: Firmware version of the LTE modem

x-device-parameters.name: central_state
x-device-parameters.summary: Enumeration of central device's sensor state for communication with BL654 Sensor, BT510-CT, and BT710-CT

x-device-parameters.name: sensor_bluetooth_address
x-device-parameters.summary: Unprocessed output from address formatter

x-device-parameters.name: join_delay
x-device-parameters.summary: Value in seconds. Write: Control point - Write 0 to generate new delay with value between (min, max) and a multiple of interval. Read: Randomized time in seconds to delay before joining
x-device-parameters.description: If modem boot is selected during compile time, then modem is held in reset until delay expires. If modem boots into airplane mode, then exit from airplane mode and network init is delayed.

x-device-parameters.name: join_min
x-device-parameters.summary: Minimum delay is joinMin * joinInterval

x-device-parameters.name: join_max
x-device-parameters.summary: Maximum delay is joinMax * joinInterval

x-device-parameters.name: join_interval
x-device-parameters.summary: Interval in seconds.  Determines separation between devices

x-device-parameters.name: modem_boot
x-device-parameters.summary: This value mirrors compile time constants (Kconfig).  If boot is normal, then cloud join is delayed.
x-device-parameters.description: If cloud join delay isn't desired (or there isn't a modem), then set join delay and interval to 1 so that cloud delay is minimized.

x-device-parameters.name: delay_cloud_reconnect
x-device-parameters.summary: If true, then cloud reconnects will be delayed by joinDelay
x-device-parameters.description: If cloud delay is enabled, this should remain disabled.

x-device-parameters.name: apn
x-device-parameters.summary: The LTE network access point name.

x-device-parameters.name: apn_username
x-device-parameters.summary: The LTE network username

x-device-parameters.name: apn_password
x-device-parameters.summary: The LTE network password

x-device-parameters.name: apn_control_point
x-device-parameters.summary: Writing any value triggers update of APN in modem

x-device-parameters.name: apn_status
x-device-parameters.summary: Status of setting APN: 0 - success, negative errno
x-device-parameters.description: Result from mdm_hl7800_update_apn

x-device-parameters.name: modem_desired_log_level
x-device-parameters.summary: All levels below set value will be logged.  Value cannot be set higher than CONFIG_MODEM_LOG_LEVEL

x-device-parameters.name: lte_operator_index
x-device-parameters.summary: Operator Index

x-device-parameters.name: fota_control_point
x-device-parameters.summary: Firmware update over-the-air Control Point
x-device-parameters.notes: The blePrepareTimeout value applies to modem or app updates.  If a change is desired, the timeout must be set before issuing prepare command.

x-device-parameters.name: fota_status
x-device-parameters.summary: Status of FOTA operation

x-device-parameters.name: fota_file_name
x-device-parameters.summary: Absolute file name used for FOTA operation

x-device-parameters.name: fota_size
x-device-parameters.summary: Size in bytes of FOTA image

x-device-parameters.name: fota_count
x-device-parameters.summary: Bytes processed in FOTA image.  Final value may be larger than size due to alignment.

x-device-parameters.name: load_path
x-device-parameters.summary: (Default) Absolute file name for load parameters command

x-device-parameters.name: dump_path
x-device-parameters.summary: (Default) Absolute file name for dump command

x-device-parameters.name: nv_imported
x-device-parameters.summary: NV was imported into parameters

x-device-parameters.name: floaty
x-device-parameters.summary: floating point value for unit testing

x-device-parameters.name: generate_psk
x-device-parameters.summary: Write (Control Point) to generate new PSK
x-device-parameters.description: Device must be reset for new key to be loaded

x-device-parameters.name: lwm2m_psk
x-device-parameters.summary: LWM2M Private Shared Key

x-device-parameters.name: lwm2m_client_id
x-device-parameters.summary: Client

x-device-parameters.name: lwm2m_peer_url
x-device-parameters.summary: URL for LWM2M Demo

x-device-parameters.name: lte_init_error
x-device-parameters.summary: Initialization status of LTE module

x-device-parameters.name: cloud_error
x-device-parameters.summary: Initialization status of demo (endpoint, id, credentials)

x-device-parameters.name: commissioning_busy
x-device-parameters.summary: Remains true when commissioning is in progress and until cloud connect is attempted.
x-device-parameters.description: If certs fail to load, this flag will be set to false. See commissioned, cert_status and cloud_error.

x-device-parameters.name: imsi
x-device-parameters.summary: international mobile subscriber identity

x-device-parameters.name: modem_functionality
x-device-parameters.summary: Modem mode

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_init_error
x-device-parameters.summary: Initialization status of Ethernet module

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_mac
x-device-parameters.summary: MAC address of Ethernet module

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_type
x-device-parameters.summary: Type of Ethernet network mode

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_mode
x-device-parameters.summary: Operating mode of Ethernet network

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_cable_detected
x-device-parameters.summary: If there is a cable attached to the Ethernet module

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_speed
x-device-parameters.summary: Bitmask value specifying the connectivity speed the Ethernet module is operating in/supports

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_duplex
x-device-parameters.summary: Bitmask value specifying if the Ethernet module is operating/supports full or half duplex

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_ip_address
x-device-parameters.summary: Read to get the current active IP address of the Ethernet module

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_netmask_length
x-device-parameters.summary: Read to get the current active netmask length of the Ethernet module

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_gateway
x-device-parameters.summary: Read to get the current active gateway IP address of the Ethernet module

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_dns
x-device-parameters.summary: Read to get the current active DNS server IP address of the Ethernet module

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_static_ip_address
x-device-parameters.summary: The IP address of the Ethernet module which is used when configured in static operating mode

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_static_netmask_length
x-device-parameters.summary: The netmask length of the Ethernet module which is used when configured in static operating mode

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_static_gateway
x-device-parameters.summary: The gateway IP address of the Ethernet module which is used when configured in static operating mode

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_static_dns
x-device-parameters.summary: The DNS server IP address of the Ethernet module which is used when configured in static operating mode

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_dhcp_lease_time
x-device-parameters.summary: The DHCP lease time of the ethernet module (if DHCP is active)

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_dhcp_renew_time
x-device-parameters.summary: The DHCP renew time of the ethernet module (if DHCP is active)

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_dhcp_state
x-device-parameters.summary: The current DHCP state of the ethernet module (if DHCP is active)

x-device-parameters.name: ethernet_dhcp_attempts
x-device-parameters.summary: The number of attempts which were taken to obtain a DHCP lease on the ethernet module (if DHCP is active)

x-device-parameters.name: sntp_server
x-device-parameters.summary: Server IP/Hostname of SNTP server to query

x-device-parameters.name: gps_rate
x-device-parameters.summary: Start or Stop GPS.  When non-zero the value is the number of seconds between location requests.  Modem will be put into Airplane mode when non-zero.

x-device-parameters.name: gps_time
x-device-parameters.summary: GPS time and date of the fix in "yyyy mm dd hh:mm:ss" format

x-device-parameters.name: gps_hepe
x-device-parameters.summary: Horizontal Estimated Position Error

x-device-parameters.name: gps_altitude
x-device-parameters.summary: Altitude in meters

x-device-parameters.name: gps_alt_unc
x-device-parameters.summary: Altitude Uncertainty in meters

x-device-parameters.name: gps_heading
x-device-parameters.summary: Direction the UE is headed

x-device-parameters.name: gps_hor_speed
x-device-parameters.summary: Horizontal speed in m/s

x-device-parameters.name: gps_ver_speed
x-device-parameters.summary: Vertical speed in m/s

x-device-parameters.name: gps_status
x-device-parameters.summary: Current status of GPS Position

x-device-parameters.name: polte_control_point
x-device-parameters.summary: Used to issue PoLTE commands
x-device-parameters.notes: The register and locate commands can take 20-120 seconds to complete

x-device-parameters.name: polte_status
x-device-parameters.summary: PoLTE status: 0 on success, positive PoLTE error code, else negative errno

x-device-parameters.name: polte_user
x-device-parameters.summary: User name for PoLTE (Modem doesn't store this in NV)

x-device-parameters.name: polte_password
x-device-parameters.summary: Password for PoLTE (Modem doesn't store this in NV)

x-device-parameters.name: polte_latitude
x-device-parameters.summary: Format in decimal degrees. Positive values represent North, negative values represent South.

x-device-parameters.name: polte_longitude
x-device-parameters.summary: Format in decimal degrees. Positive values represent East, negative values represent West

x-device-parameters.name: polte_confidence
x-device-parameters.summary: Certainty of fix in meters

x-device-parameters.name: polte_timestamp
x-device-parameters.summary: Timestamp of the position in seconds from January 1, 1970

x-device-parameters.name: ble_prepare_timeout
x-device-parameters.summary: Timeout in seconds for successful FOTA update before re-enabling scanning.

x-device-parameters.name: temperature_offset
x-device-parameters.summary: Offset applied to value read from LIS3DH
x-device-parameters.notes: Can be used in conjunction with single point calibration

x-device-parameters.name: lwm2m_enable_bootstrap
x-device-parameters.summary: If true, bootstrap procedure will be enabled during initialization

x-device-parameters.name: settings_passcode_status
x-device-parameters.summary: Will return the status of current settings passcode entered

x-device-parameters.name: lock_status
x-device-parameters.summary: Lock status, 0 = lock not setup, 1 = lock setup and engaged, 2 = lock setup and disengaged
